entry.def: A month is one of the twelve periods of time that a year is divided into, for example January or February.

example.ex: The trial is due to begin next month.
...an exhibition which opens this month at London's Design Museum...
example.tran: 这个月在伦敦设计博物馆开办的展览

entry.def: A month is a period of about four weeks.

example.ex: She was here for a month...
Over the next several months I met most of her family...
example.tran: 在后来的几个月里，我见到了她的大部分家人。

means.word_mean: 1. one of the twelve divisions of the calendar year;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English mōnath, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch maand and German Monat, also to moon

sentences.cn: 这将会是一个让你有机会开心并且适时喘息的月份, 亲爱的蝎子.
sentences.en: This month you will have a chance to have fun and catch your breath, dear Scorpio.

sentences.cn: 二月是个沉闷的月份.
sentences.en: February is a month of languors.

sentences.cn: 这是投机股票相当危险的一个月份.
sentences.en: This is one of the peculiarly dangerous months to speculate in stocks.

sentences.cn: 生活费用上涨了六个月以后于九月份稳定下来.
sentences.en: After going up for six months, the cost of living leveled off in September.

sentences.cn: 然后孩子们亲手绘制不同的图画来代表每个月份.
sentences.en: The children are then drawing a picture to represent each month.

sentences.cn: 下月份他们将出版这本书的一个新版本.
sentences.en: Next month they will bring out a new edition of the book.

sentences.cn: 他在古巴和希腊采访的那几个月份里表现了这两种风格.
sentences.en: The are both expressed in his crowded months ain Cuba and Greece.

sentences.cn: 每年这个时候都使我想起那些月份是怎么过去的.
sentences.en: The time of year reminds me how the months have gone.

sentences.cn: 本月份, 国家地理频道将播出他们精采的探险之旅.
sentences.en: This month, National Geographic Channel will air their amazing adventure.

sentences.cn: 要花一个月的时间才能清理完积压的工作.
sentences.en: It will take a month to clear the backlog of work.

sentences.cn: 他又用一个月的时间精心修改了他的小说.
sentences.en: He worked another month to subtilize his novel.

sentences.cn: 骨折至少要一个月的时间才能愈合.
sentences.en: It will take at least one month for the broken hone to hear up.

sentences.cn: 这个计划必须尽快实施. 一个月的时间应该够了 吧 ?
sentences.en: Our project must proceed a reasonably quick tempo. Surely one month is ample time, isn't it?

sentences.cn: 我们至少要花一个月的时间,才能找到合适的人选来代替你.
sentences.en: It will take us at least a month to find a suitable replacement for you.

sentences.cn: 用来测试的滑翔器靠电池运行, 可以维持一个月的时间.
sentences.en: The glider being trialled runs on batteries, and can last up to a month.

sentences.cn: 多莉花了一个月的时间在东京游玩.
sentences.en: Dolly spent a month touring in Tokyo.

sentences.cn: 新来的秘书要一个月的时间熟悉工作.
sentences.en: It takes a new secretary one month to break in.

sentences.cn: 接近一个月的时间里,本田就已基本实现12,000辆的国内年销售目标.
sentences.en: Honda has nearly reached its domestic annual sales goal of 12,000 in just under a month.

sentences.cn: 一般定做一套家具需要一个月的时间.
sentences.en: Generally, it takes a month for them to finish making a set of furniture.

sentences.cn: 在公开拍卖之前, 他给了买家一个月的时间出价.
sentences.en: In the public auction, he had to offer buyers a month.

sentences.cn: 最后, 最多花一个月的时间成功脱身.
sentences.en: Finally, there will be a managed disengagement over a period of a month at most.

sentences.cn: 我在重重地“摔”了一跤后,有一个月的时间不能行动.
sentences.en: After a bad fall I was out of action a month.

sentences.cn: 我用了一个月的时间藤编了这四把椅子.
sentences.en: It has taken me a month to weave the four cane chairs.

sentences.cn: 你总不能要求我们在不到一个月的时间内交货吧.
sentences.en: You cannot expect us to make delivery in less than a month.

sentences.cn: 他们已经花费了一个月的时间来计画他们的婚礼和买了一间房子准备庆祝.
sentences.en: They had spent months palnning the wedding and getting their house ready for the celebration.

sentences.cn: 这个计画必须尽速进行. 一个月的时间应该够了 吧 ?
sentences.en: Our project must proceedat a reasonably quick tempo . Surely one month is ample time, isn't it ?

sentences.cn: 在最后期限前我们还有一个月的时间.
sentences.en: We still have one month to finish before the deadline.

sentences.cn: 我在重重地摔了一跤后,有一个月的时间不能行动.
sentences.en: After a bad fall I was out of action for a month.

sentences.cn: 这位画家仅仅用了一个月的时间就完成了一幅山水长卷.
sentences.en: It took the painter only a month to finish a long painting of moutains and rivers.

sentences.cn: 一个月的时间应该够了 吧 ?
sentences.en: Surely one month is ample time, isn't it?

sentences.cn: 他为了选择工作犹豫不决地浪费了一个月的时间.
sentences.en: For a month he dillydallylied over the choice of a job.

sentences.cn: 以为我们用一个月的时间就能把房子盖好,这种想法不切合实际.
sentences.en: It was impractical to think that we could build the house in one month.

sentences.cn: 律政司将有一个月的时间来抉择是支持被告还是墨守成规保持中立.
sentences.en: It has a month to decide whether to support the defendants or offer no opinion.

sentences.cn: 它们开花为一个月的时间和逐渐消失很快.
sentences.en: They bloom for a month and fade away in no time.

sentences.cn: 他几乎有一个月的时间卧床不起，命悬一线。
sentences.en: For almost a month he lay near death.
